Class ProductHandler

java.lang.Object
ProductService.ProductHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpHandler
public class ProductHandler extends Object implements HttpHandler
Handles the given product request and generates an appropriate response.

  • Method Details

    • handle

      public void handle(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Routes requests based on HTTP method.

      Assumptions: Only GET and POST are supported. Other methods are ignored unless handled elsewhere.

      Specified by:
      handle in interface HttpHandler
      Parameters:
      exchange - the HTTP exchange; must be non-null
      Throws:
      IOException

    • handleCreate

      public void handleCreate(HttpExchange exchange, int id, String body) throws IOException
      Handles a create command. Create a new product in database if all fields are valid.

      Responses:

      • 200: product creation success; response body is product.toJson()
      • 400: missing fields or invalid field type; response body is errorResponse
      • 409: duplicate product id; response body is errorResponse
      Parameters:
      exchange - the HTTP exchange used to read and write the response; must be non-null
      id - the product id of the product to be created
      body - a JSON string containing the product id, name, description, price, and quantity
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while sending the response

    • handleUpdate

      public void handleUpdate(HttpExchange exchange, int id, String body) throws IOException
      Handles a update command. Update an existing product in database if updating fields are valid.

      Responses:

      • 200: product update success; response body is product.toJson()
      • 400: missing fields or invalid field type; response body is errorResponse
      • 404: product id does not exist; response body is errorResponse
      Parameters:
      exchange - the HTTP exchange used to read and write the response; must be non-null
      id - the product id of the product to be updated
      body - a JSON string containing the product id, name, description, price, and quantity
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while sending the response

    • handleDelete

      public void handleDelete(HttpExchange exchange, int id, String body) throws IOException
      Handles a delete command. Delete an existing product in database if all fields are valid.

      Responses:

      • 200: product delete success; response body is product.toJson()
      • 400: missing fields or invalid field type; response body is errorResponse
      • 404: product id does not exist; response body is errorResponse
      Parameters:
      exchange - the HTTP exchange used to read and write the response; must be non-null
      id - the product id of the product to be deleted
      body - a JSON string containing the product id, name, description, price, and quantity
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while sending the response
